confide.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to tell someone you trust about personal things that you do not want other people to know
confide.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: He confided to his friends that he didn’t have much hope for his marriage.
confide.translation[0].definitions[1].de: to give something you value to someone you trust so they look after it for you
confide.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: He confided his money to his brother’s safekeeping.
